title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Break into The Heist Challenge
content:
Embrace stealth, teamwork, and that insatiable hunger for the almighty dollar as you pilfer your way through El Rubioâ€™s exotic Cayo Perico compound, break into The Diamond Casino & Resort's highly secure vault, save San Andreas from total annihilation, and pull off a string of intense robberies at some of Los Santos' most closely guarded institutions during The Heist Challenge.

Each week in November will focus on a different Heist, with The Cayo Perico Heist taking center stage this week.
